compositeCheatsheet.name: Connecting Greenbone Security Manager and verinice

taskGroup.name: Connecting Greenbone Security Manager and verinice
taskGroup.intro:
In connection with a Greenbone vulnerability scanner (www.greenbone.net) as well as an OpenVAS vulnerability scanner (www.openvas.org) verinice enables an effective vulnerability management. The connection offers two basic use cases.
IT baseline security with Greenbone and verinice
Importing the results of a vulnerability scan into verinice in the BSI Baseline Security provides the functionalities structural analysis, modeling and automatic basisc security check.
Information Security Management with Greenbone and verinice
In the ISM perspective verinice supports you in performing the risk analysis and the vulnerability management after importing the results of a vulnerability scan. Exclusive in verinice.PRO there is an additional task workflow for the elimination of vulnerabilities implemented.
